org.gvsig.catalog

Class CatalogClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.catalog.DiscoveryServiceClient
      • org.gvsig.catalog.CatalogClient

  • public class CatalogClient
extends DiscoveryServiceClient
    This class represents a catalogClient. It must be created to use the catalog service
